title: OnOptions
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Bristol Myers Squibb tops quarterly estimates, hikes outlook as drugmaker braces for tariffs
items.description: The guidance revisions include the estimated impact of current tariffs on U.S. products shipped to China, but not Trump's planned pharmaceutical tarif...

items.title: World’s largest sovereign wealth fund reports $40 billion loss in first quarter on tech downturn
items.description: Norway's sovereign wealth fund on Thursday reported a first-quarter loss of 415 billion kroner ($40 billion), citing weakness in the tech sector.

items.title: Comcast beats first-quarter earnings estimates despite losing broadband customers
items.description: Comcast lost 199,000 total domestic broadband customers, reflecting the continued pressure on the cable giant's cornerstone business.

items.title: Merck lowers profit outlook, partly due to $200 million expected tariff hit

items.title: PepsiCo cuts earnings forecast as it predicts 'uncertainty' in tariffs, consumer spending
items.description: PepsiCo cut its forecast for its core constant currency earnings per share, citing new tariffs.

items.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat

items.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
items.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

items.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek

items.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
items.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
